definition: to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: The window of opportunity is shrinking, and differentiation is harder to claim.
sentences.chinese: 机会之窗正在变小，差异化更难断言。

sentences.english: None of the claims about the Prince were ever proven and no rumours were substantiated.
sentences.chinese: 上述对亲王的种种断言及风言风语都没有得到证实。

sentences.english: Two eyewitnesses averred they had seen the defendant at the scene.
sentences.chinese: 两个目击者断言他们在现场看到了那个被告。

sentences.english: However, the meaning of the test is the converse of the meaning for assertions.
sentences.chinese: 但是，测试的意义与断言的意义正好相反。

sentences.english: You should validate using data types and assertions as well.
sentences.chinese: 还要使用数据类型和断言进行验证。

sentences.english: The rationalist finally will be of dogmatic temper in his affirmations .
sentences.chinese: 最后，理性主义者在断言时总带些武断性的气质。

sentences.english: I realize that seems a preposterous claim.
sentences.chinese: 我知道这个断言有点荒谬。

sentences.english: Instead, it simply asserts user identity information.
sentences.chinese: 它将直接断言用户标识信息。

sentences.english: But another official said such assertions are groundless.
sentences.chinese: 但另一名官员说，这种断言是站不住脚的。

sentences.english: Your proposal is acceptable, as we all predicate.
sentences.chinese: 正如我们所断言的那样，你的建议是可以接受的。

sentences.english: The application acquires the identity for assertion.
sentences.chinese: 应用程序获得断言的标识。

sentences.english: Thus, the assertions can be used safely in destructors, too.
sentences.chinese: 因此，也可以在析构函数中安全地使用断言。

sentences.english: On the assertion of producer, gluing they are resistant to abrasion and action of water.
sentences.chinese: 就断言生产者，胶合他们是抗磨损和行动的水。

sentences.english: At least that's what some China-watchers are betting.
sentences.chinese: 至少一些中国观察者是这么断言的。

sentences.english: Can we say with certitude that Greece doesn't have enough money to pay its debts? Yes.
sentences.chinese: 我们能断言希腊没有足够的钱偿付债务吗？

sentences.english: Semantic mediation through business policies containing assertions on properties in the service context.
sentences.chinese: 通过在服务上下文的属性中包含断言进行语义中介。

definition: to conclude/to determine/to come to a judgment
lies/wild talk/to tell lies/to talk nonsense/fantasy (literature)
to jump to an unfounded conclusion
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
to be convinced/to be sure/to firmly believe/to be positive that/definite news
to doubt (sth)/to be skeptical of/to have one's doubts/to harbor suspicions/to suspect that
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
